channel.title: Commands
channel.description:
What Comand is it for d legs? ::?? What Comand is it for Verac Plate ::?? What command is it for whip ::?? Give me some other good commands
I want to know some basic comands for mor....(the drop numbers)

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @baller305 baller305
item.description:
@baller305 wrote:

kk if u want to get all that follow this steps

1.open mopar
2.log in with any username and pass and defaukt ip and port
3.in the top bar look for help
4.open item ids
5.search for the item u want
6.then next to the item u searched for there should be a number
7.in mopar chat bar type ::item (item id) this means to put a space and id after item. Example ::item 4151 i think is whip

well thats it! easy rite!!!

Note: if u want money type ::pickup 0995 then a space and amount of money u want. Example ::pickup 0995 999999999 for 999m

Read full topic
